description:
Gintama kicks off its late-night airing with Odd Jobs "hiding" in Akiba. That`s when they get a visitor with a request...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 1 - Le monstre et l`enfant-monstre
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 1 - The Monster and the Monster`s Child
Rakuyou Kessen Hen Ichi: Bakemono to Bakemono no Ko
洛陽決戦篇一 化物と化物の子
